resources.string: See more or less information about a Tip.
Try to identify at least three goals you can track. Doing so will help you keep up your motivation.
Take a look at the foods you have in stock. Toss any that are highly processed, or contain artificial additives or ingredients you dont recognize.
Before you weigh yourself, check in with your emotions. Some people look at weight as a data point.
Choose a physical activity you enjoy and devote 30 minutes to it.
If your eating habits have been a bit erratic, try adjusting your portion sizes naturally
Core strength can improve your posture, prevent back pain, support proper breathing, even boost digestion.
Good fats like avocado help reduce inflammation, improve circulation, and protect your heart.
Its not realistic to go through life never eating your favorite goodies. And its not necessary either, even if youre trying to lose or maintain your weight.
